thread.title: Check out the Atlanta Falcons' hype video for the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Check out the Atlanta Falcons' hype video for the Super Bowl

title: Check out the Atlanta Falcons' hype video for the Super Bowl
text:
Feb 4, 2017 at 5:55p ET 0Shares 
The Atlanta Falcons are seeking their first Super Bowl victory against the New England Patriots on Sunday (FOX, FOX Sports GO, 6:30 p.m. ET). 
And the team released a hype video that will certainly give its fans some chills as they await the thrills of Super Bowl LI in NRG Stadium in Houston. 
Check out the Super Bowl chapter of “In Brotherhood.” 
If the fans in the ATL weren’t pumped enough by having bars staying open and extra 2 1/2 hours Sunday into Monday morning, this will send them through the roof.
